00015 void PhaseLoop::beam_phase() {
00016     /*
00017      *Beam phase measured at the main RF frequency and phase. The beam is
00018      convolved with the window function of the band-pass filter of the
00019      machine. The coefficients of sine and cosine components determine the
00020      beam phase, projected to the range -Pi/2 to 3/2 Pi. Note that this beam
00021      phase is already w.r.t. the instantaneous RF phase.*
00022      */
00023 
00024     // Main RF frequency at the present turn
00025     // omega_RF = self.rf_params.omega_RF[0,self.rf_params.counter[0]]
00026     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00027     auto Slice = Context::Slice;
00028 
00029     ftype omega_RF = RfP->omega_RF[RfP->idx][RfP->counter];
00030     ftype phi_RF = RfP->phi_RF[RfP->idx][RfP->counter];
00031     // Convolve with window function
00032     //
00033     ftype* base = new ftype[Slice->n_slices];
00034     ftype* array = new ftype[Slice->n_slices];
00035 
00036 #pragma omp parallel for
00037     for (int i = 0; i < (int)Slice->n_slices; ++i) {
00038         const ftype a = alpha * Slice->bin_centers[i];
00039         base[i] = std::exp(a) * Slice->n_macroparticles[i];
00040     }
00041 
00042 #pragma omp parallel for
00043     for (int i = 0; i < (int)Slice->n_slices; ++i) {
00044         const ftype a = omega_RF * Slice->bin_centers[i] + phi_RF;
00045         array[i] = base[i] * std::sin(a);
00046     }
00047     ftype scoeff =
00048         mymath::trapezoid(array, Slice->bin_centers.data(), Slice->n_slices);
00049 
00050 #pragma omp parallel for
00051     for (int i = 0; i < (int)Slice->n_slices; ++i) {
00052         const ftype a = omega_RF * Slice->bin_centers[i] + phi_RF;
00053         array[i] = base[i] * std::cos(a);
00054     }
00055 
00056     ftype ccoeff =
00057         mymath::trapezoid(array, Slice->bin_centers.data(), Slice->n_slices);
00058 
00059     phi_beam = std::atan(scoeff / ccoeff) + constant::pi;
00060 
00061     delete[] base;
00062     delete[] array;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void PhaseLoop::phase_difference() {
00066     /*
00067      Phase difference between beam and RF phase of the main RF system.
00068      Optional: add RF phase noise through dphi directly.*
00069      */
00070     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00071     // Correct for design stable phase
00072     uint counter = RfP->counter;
00073     dphi = phi_beam - RfP->phi_s[counter];
00074     // Possibility to add RF phase noise through the PL
00075     if (RFnoise != NULL) {
00076         if (noiseFB != NULL) {
00077             dphi += noiseFB->fX * RFnoise->fDphi[counter];
00078         } else {
00079             dphi += RFnoise->fDphi[counter];
00080         }
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void PhaseLoop::radial_steering_from_freq() {
00085     // Frequency and phase change for the current turn due to the
00086     // radial steering program.
00087     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00088     auto GP = Context::GP;
00089     const uint counter = RfP->counter;
00090 
00091     const auto radial_steering_domega_RF =
00092         -RfP->omega_RF_d[0][counter] * RfP->eta_0(counter) / GP->alpha[0][0] *
00093         reference / GP->ring_radius;
00094 
00095     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00096         RfP->omega_RF[i][counter] += radial_steering_domega_RF *
00097                                      RfP->harmonic[i][counter] /
00098                                      RfP->harmonic[0][counter];
00099     }
00100 
00101     // Update the RF phase of all systems for the next turn
00102     // Accumulated phase offset due to PL in each RF system
00103     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00104         RfP->dphi_RF_steering[i] +=
00105             2 * constant::pi * RfP->harmonic[i][counter] *
00106             (RfP->omega_RF[i][counter] - RfP->omega_RF_d[i][counter]) /
00107             RfP->omega_RF_d[i][counter];
00108     }
00109 
00110     // Total phase offset
00111     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00112         RfP->phi_RF[i][counter] += RfP->dphi_RF_steering[i];
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void PhaseLoop::radial_difference() {
00117     auto GP = Context::GP;
00118     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00119     auto Slice = Context::Slice;
00120     auto Beam = Context::Beam;
00121 
00122     // Radial difference between beam and design orbit.*
00123     uint counter = RfP->counter;
00124     uint n = 0;
00125     ftype sum = 0;
00126     // ftype array[GP->n_turns];
00127     for (uint i = 0; i < GP->n_turns; ++i) {
00128         if (Beam->dt[i] > Slice->bin_centers.front() &&
00129             Beam->dt[i] < Slice->bin_centers.back()) {
00130             sum += Beam->dE[i];
00131             n++;
00132         }
00133     }
00134     auto average_dE = n > 0 ? sum / n : 0.0;
00135     // std::cout << "average_dE : " << average_dE << "\n";
00136     drho =
00137         GP->alpha[0][0] * GP->ring_radius * average_dE /
00138         (GP->beta[0][counter] * GP->beta[0][counter] * GP->energy[0][counter]);
00139     // std::cout << "drho : " << drho << "\n";
00140 }
00141 
00142 void PhaseLoop::default_track() {
00143     /*
00144      Calculate PL correction on main RF frequency depending on machine.
00145      Update the RF phase and frequency of the next turn for all systems.
00146      */
00147     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00148 
00149     uint counter = RfP->counter + 1;
00150     // uint turns = GP->n_turns;
00151     // Update the RF frequency of all systems for the next turn
00152     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00153         RfP->omega_RF[i][counter] +=
00154             domega_RF * RfP->harmonic[i][counter] / RfP->harmonic[0][counter];
00155     }
00156 
00157     // Update the RF phase of all systems for the next turn
00158     // Accumulated phase offset due to PL in each RF system
00159     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00160         RfP->dphi_RF[i] +=
00161             2 * constant::pi * RfP->harmonic[i][counter] *
00162             (RfP->omega_RF[i][counter] - RfP->omega_RF_d[i][counter]) /
00163             RfP->omega_RF_d[i][counter];
00164     }
00165 
00166     // Total phase offset
00167     for (uint i = 0; i < RfP->n_rf; ++i) {
00168         RfP->phi_RF[i][counter] += RfP->dphi_RF[i];
00169     }
00170 }
00171 
00172 LHC::LHC(f_vector_t PL_gain, ftype SL_gain, ftype window_coefficient,
00173          PhaseNoise* phaseNoise, LHCNoiseFB* LHCNoiseFB, uint _delay) {
00174     auto GP = Context::GP;
00175     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00176 
00177     // General Initializations
00178     this->delay = _delay;
00179     this->alpha = window_coefficient;
00180     this->gain = PL_gain;
00181     this->RFnoise = phaseNoise;
00182     this->noiseFB = LHCNoiseFB;
00183     // End of general initializations
00184 
00185     this->gain2 = SL_gain;
00186     this->lhc_y = 0;
00187     this->lhc_a.resize(GP->n_turns + 1, 0);
00188     this->lhc_t.resize(GP->n_turns + 1, 0);
00189 
00190     if (gain2 != 0) {
00191         for (uint i = 0; i < GP->n_turns + 1; ++i) {
00192             lhc_a[i] = 5.25 - RfP->omega_s0[i] / (constant::pi * 40);
00193         }
00194         for (uint i = 0; i < GP->n_turns + 1; ++i) {
00195             lhc_t[i] = (2 * constant::pi * RfP->Qs[i] * sqrt(lhc_a[i])) /
00196                        sqrt(1 +
00197                             gain[i] / gain2 *
00198                                 sqrt((1 + 1 / lhc_a[i]) / (1 + lhc_a[i])));
00199         }
00200     }
00201 }

00203 LHC::~LHC() {}
00204 
00205 void LHC::track() {
00206     /*
00207      Calculation of the LHC RF frequency correction from the phase difference
00208      between beam and RF (actual synchronous phase). The transfer function is
00209 
00210      .. math::
00211      \\Delta \\omega_{rf}^{PL} = - g_{PL} (\\Delta\\varphi_{PL} + \\phi_{N})
00212 
00213      where the phase noise for the controlled blow-up can be optionally
00214      activated.
00215      Using 'gain2', a synchro loop can be activated in addition to remove
00216      long-term frequency drifts:
00217 
00218      .. math::
00219      \\Delta \\omega_{rf}^{SL} = - g_{SL} (y + a \\Delta\\varphi_{rf}) ,
00220 
00221      where we use the recursion
00222 
00223      .. math::
00224      y_{n+1} = (1 - \\tau) y_n + (1 - a) \\tau \\Delta\\varphi_{rf} ,
00225 
00226      with a and \tau being defined through the synchrotron frequency f_s and
00227      the synchrotron tune Q_s as
00228 
00229      .. math::
00230      a (f_s) \\equiv 5.25 - \\frac{f_s}{\\pi 40~\\text{Hz}} ,
00231 
00232      .. math::
00233      \\tau(f_s) \\equiv 2 \\pi Q_s \\sqrt{ \\frac{a}{1 + \\frac{g_{PL}}{g_{SL}}
00234      \\sqrt{\\frac{1 + 1/a}{1 + a}} }}
00235      */
00236     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00237 
00238     uint counter = RfP->counter;
00239     ftype dphi_RF = RfP->dphi_RF[0];
00240 
00241     beam_phase();
00242     phase_difference();
00243 
00244     // Frequency correction from phase loop and synchro loop
00245 
00246     domega_RF = -gain[counter] * dphi -
00247                 gain2 * (lhc_y + lhc_a[counter] * (dphi_RF + reference));
00248 
00249     // Update recursion variable
00250     lhc_y = (1 - lhc_t[counter]) * lhc_y +
00251             (1 - lhc_a[counter]) * lhc_t[counter] * (dphi_RF + reference);
00252 
00253     default_track();
00254 }
00255 
00256 PSB::PSB(f_vector_t PL_gain, f_vector_t _RL_gain, ftype _PL_period,
00257          ftype _RL_period, f_vector_t coefficients, ftype window_coefficient,
00258          PhaseNoise* phaseNoise, LHCNoiseFB* LHCNoiseFB, uint _delay) {
00259 
00260     // General Initializations
00261     this->delay = _delay;
00262     this->alpha = window_coefficient;
00263     this->gain = PL_gain;
00264     this->RFnoise = phaseNoise;
00265     this->noiseFB = LHCNoiseFB;
00266     // End of general initializations
00267 
00268     // figure out what to do with these pairs
00269     this->gain2.resize(2); // = new ftype[2];
00270     this->dt.resize(2);    // = new uint[2];
00271 
00272     if (_RL_gain.empty()) {
00273         gain2[0] = 0;
00274         gain2[1] = 0;
00275     } else {
00276         gain2[0] = _RL_gain[0];
00277         gain2[1] = _RL_gain[1];
00278     }
00279 
00280     if (_PL_period == 0)
00281         dt[0] = 10e-6;
00282     else
00283         dt[0] = _PL_period;
00284 
00285     if (_RL_period == 0)
00286         dt[1] = 7;
00287     else
00288         dt[1] = _RL_period;
00289 
00290     this->PL_counter = 1;
00291     this->on_time.push_back(0);
00292 
00293     precalculate_time();
00294 
00295     // TODO coefficients
00296     // How many can i have?
00297 
00298     //*Memory of previous phase correction, for phase loop.*
00299     dphi_av = 0;
00300     dphi_av_prev = 0;
00301     //*Memory of previous relative radial correction, for rad loop.*
00302     drho_prev = 0;
00303     //*Accumulated time for radial loop*
00304     t_accum = 0;
00305     //*Phase loop frequency correction [1/s]*
00306     domega_PL = 0;
00307     //*Radial loop frequency correction [1/s]*
00308     domega_RL = 0;
00309     // domega_RF = 0;
00310 }

00314 void PSB::track() {
00315     /*
00316      Calculation of the PSB RF frequency correction from the phase difference
00317      between beam and RF (actual synchronous phase). The transfer function is
00318 
00319      .. math::
00320      \\Delta \\omega_{RF} = g(t) \\frac{a_0 \\Delta\\Phi_{PL}^2 + a_1
00321      \\Delta\\Phi_{PL} + a_2 }{b_0 \\Delta\\Phi_{PL}^2 + b_1 \\Delta\\Phi_{PL} +
00322      b_2}
00323 
00324      Input g through gain and [a_0, a_1, a_2, b_0, b_1, b_2] through
00325      coefficients.
00326      */
00327     auto GP = Context::GP;
00328     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00329 
00330     // Average phase error while frequency is updated
00331     uint counter = RfP->counter;
00332 
00333     beam_phase();
00334     phase_difference();
00335     dphi_av += dphi;
00336     t_accum += GP->t_rev[counter];
00337 
00338     // dprintf("Before if counter is %d\n", counter);
00339     // Phase loop active on certain turns
00340 
00341     if (counter == on_time[PL_counter] && counter > delay) {
00342         dphi_av /= (on_time[PL_counter] - on_time[PL_counter - 1]);
00343 
00344         domega_PL = 0.998 * domega_PL -
00345                     gain[counter] * (dphi_av - dphi_av_prev + reference);
00346 
00347         // Update averaging variables
00348         dphi_av_prev = dphi_av;
00349         dphi_av = 0;
00350 
00351         // Add correction from radial loop
00352         if (PL_counter % static_cast<int>(dt[1]) == 0) {
00353 
00354             drho = (RfP->omega_RF[0][counter] - RfP->omega_RF_d[0][counter]) /
00355                        (RfP->omega_RF_d[0][counter] *
00356                         (1 / (GP->alpha[0][0] * RfP->gamma(counter) *
00357                               RfP->gamma(counter)) -
00358                          1)) +
00359                    reference;
00360 
00361             domega_RL = domega_RL - gain2[0] * (drho - drho_prev) -
00362                         gain2[1] * drho * t_accum;
00363 
00364             drho_prev = drho;
00365             t_accum = 0;
00366         }
00367 
00368         // Counter to pick the next time step when the PL will be active
00369         PL_counter++;
00370     }
00371     // Apply frequency correction
00372     domega_RF = domega_PL + domega_RL;
00373 
00374     default_track();
00375 }
00376 
00377 void PSB::precalculate_time() {
00378     /*
00379      For machines like the PSB, where the PL acts only in certain time
00380      intervals, pre-calculate on which turns to act.
00381      */
00382     auto GP = Context::GP;
00383 
00384     uint n = delay + 1;
00385 
00386     while (n < GP->t_rev.size()) {
00387         auto summa = 0.0;
00388         while (summa < dt[0]) {
00389             if (n < GP->t_rev.size()) {
00390                 summa += GP->t_rev[n];
00391                 n++;
00392             } else {
00393                 on_time.push_back(0);
00394                 return;
00395             }
00396         }
00397         on_time.push_back(n - 1);
00398     }
00399 }

00410 }

00414 void LHC_F::track() {
00415     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00416 
00417     uint counter = RfP->counter;
00418 
00419     beam_phase();
00420     phase_difference();
00421 
00422     // Frequency correction from phase loop and frequency loop
00423     const auto factor =
00424         RfP->omega_RF[0][counter] - RfP->omega_RF_d[0][counter] + reference;
00425     // for (int i = 0; i < (int)gain.size(); ++i) {
00426     domega_RF = -gain * dphi - gain2 * factor;
00427     // }
00428 
00429     default_track();
00430 }

00444 // TODO Test this function
00445 void SPS_RL::track() {
00446     auto GP = Context::GP;
00447     auto RfP = Context::RfP;
00448 
00449     uint counter = RfP->counter;
00450 
00451     if (reference != 0)
00452         radial_steering_from_freq();
00453 
00454     beam_phase();
00455     phase_difference();
00456     radial_difference();
00457 
00458     // Frequency correction from phase loop and radial loop
00459     const auto factor = mymath::sign(RfP->eta_0(counter)) * (reference - drho) /
00460                         GP->ring_radius;
00461 
00462     // for (int i = 0; i < (int)gain.size(); ++i) {
00463     domega_RF = -gain * dphi - gain2 * factor;
00464     // }
00465 
00466     default_track();
00467 }
